beginner.status: Use 'Status' to see what files have changed before committing.
beginner.add: Stage files with 'Add' before committing. Think of staging as preparing your changes.
beginner.commit: Write clear commit messages that explain WHY you made the change.
beginner.push: Push regularly to back up your work on the remote server.
beginner.pull: Pull before starting work to avoid merge conflicts.
beginner.branch: Use branches to work on features without affecting the main code.

intermediate.commit: Use conventional commits (feat:, fix:, docs:) for better history.
intermediate.rebase: Consider rebasing for a cleaner history before merging.
